intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: What do you wear in summer?
What is your favorite movie genre?

respond_situations.starter_line: Do you want to buy something?
respond_situations.description: The examiner asks if you want to buy an item in the shop.

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to drink?
respond_situations.description: The examiner asks about your drink choice at a café.

ask_situations.instruction: You want to ask your parent for help with homework. ..
You are shopping. Ask the shopkeeper for the price of a shirt.
You are at school. Ask your friend for help with homework.

listening_script.text: I wake up at 7 AM. I brush my teeth. I eat breakfast. I drink tea. I go to work.

questions.question: What time do I wake up?
What do I do after breakfast?

monologue.topic: Talk about a typical weekend day

follow_up_questions.question: What do you do on Saturday?
When do you wake up on weekends?
Where do you go with your friends?
How do you feel on weekend days?
